QuestData.Title: Not Just Any Body
QuestData.Description: Loramus Thalipedes is dead. Well, let me step back... that's an assumption on my part, but I do know that his body lies in three pieces.$b$b<Lynnore ponders for a moment.>$b$bIf you bring me the pieces, we still have a recourse. All three pieces are nearby... the Dreadmaul ogres hide them in their caves. In fact, one of them is in that chest, down the ledge behind me...
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Loramus' Head, Loramus' Torso, and Loramus' Legs.
QuestData.CompletionText: Trust me... whatever happened to Loramus, we can fix. The limits of blood magic are still undefined.
QuestData.RewardText: I see... yes, we can work with this.$b$b<Lynnore looks at the night elf's head.>$b$bLoramus Thalipedes, demon hunter. I look forward to meeting you.
